FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All scripts located in the Program Files folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run scripts that are located in the Program Files folder.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All scripts located in the Windows folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run scripts that are located in the Windows folder.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All scripts
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to run all scripts.
